metadata.title: CVE-2018-13449 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SQL injection vulnerability in product/card.php in Dolibarr ERP/CRM version7.0.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via thestatut_buy parameter.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
